mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, name AS name, sort AS sort, logo AS logo, is_enable AS isEnable, type AS type, url AS url, index_url AS indexUrl, create_user AS createUser, create_time AS createIime, update_user AS updateUser, update_time AS updateTime FROM t_sett_ms_system WHERE is_enable = 1 AND id IN (SELECT me.system_id AS systemId FROM t_sett_ms_menu me, t_sett_ms_menu_permission mp, t_ucenter_ms_role_permission rp, t_ucenter_ms_role_user_rela rr, t_ucenter_ms_user us WHERE me.menu_id = mp.menu_id AND mp.permission_id = rp.permission_id AND rr.user_id = us.user_id AND rr.role_id= rp.role_id AND us.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY me.system_id) ORDER BY sort
